discourse_list.title: DVC Meeting w/ Rune - Wednesday Feb. 1st @ 19:00 UTC

content.content: image1280×722 34.5 KB  Hey everyone, This is the thread for the 2023-02-01 DVC call with Rune. Please join us to chat about the Pregame Constitution and the latest developments in Endgame Design. Event Details: When: 2023-02-01T19:00:00Z Where: Zoom Link Add to Calendar: Here Please drop any questions related to DVC topics (with a particular emphasis on the Pregame Constitution  ). These are open calls for the Maker community to attend and discuss Endgame Strategy with Rune, please join us live or check out past meetings in this playlist.

If you haven’t seen it yet, take a look at the Pregame Constitution Draft posted here:     WIP Pregame Maker Constitution MIP draft Maker Improvement Proposals   MIPX: The Maker Constitution The Pregame Maker Constitution is an early, work-in-progress version of the Maker Constitution that contains only elements that impact Maker Governance during the Pregame phase, before SubDAOs have been launched. During the course of the Pregame it is meant to be continuously updated and modified, using the MIP process, based on new information from observed behaviour and results.   MIPXc1: Maker Constitution Vision With the Maker Constitution, Maker Governance reco…
